Reviews.Title: Works as Advertised.
Reviews.Author: SRS
Reviews.Content: I live in rowhome/townhome with a common driveway in the rear. We live in an urban area. A few weeks ago, someone walked into my yard and stole a bike that was locked to my fence. I was more concerned than angry as it was located near my back door and I was home at the time. What's to stop them from coming inside next?I've been thinking about getting a security camera for some time. After the theft, I started checking Amazon and found the Zmodo system. The reviews were all 5 stars at the time of my purchase. At around $200.00 for 4 cameras and a 500GB DVR, I figured I couldn't go wrong. If you search Zmodo on that popular video sharing site, people claim the 500GB will hold about 30 days of video and it can be set to overwrite. Once set, you can basically leave it alone and review an incident if needed.As of this writing, I have two of the four cameras installed. I have them both mounted on the rear of my home and pointed towards the drive. I've never owned a security camera before, so I have nothing to compare them to, but I am very satisfied with the clarity of the cameras during the daytime. From where I have them positioned, I can see my yard and beyond. I don't believe I can read a license plate, but my next door neighbor has a cargo van and I can read his advertising. Our back drive is very dark. Nighttime viewing is ok, but not great. However, I have a motion light mounted to the rear of my home and when it goes on, I can see my yard quite clearly.I've been using the system for about a week. Overall, I am quite pleased with my purchase. It does exactly what I need it to do at a very affordable price.Pros: It comes with 4 cameras and you can add 4 more. It's easy to install, the camera picture quality is good. It comes with everything you need to get started right away. The DVR has 500GB of memory so you don't need to add a hard drive. You can set the system for remote viewing. (Either from other computers on your network - or remote viewing using a mobile device.) I can't comment on the remote viewing as I don't have it set, but plan to do so in the near future. I'll update my review once completed.Cons: The print on the directions is small and not easy to read. However, it comes with a cd that allows you to view them on your computer. The mounting brackets are ok, not great. If you need to monitor a very dark area, you might want to add a motion light or some other form of outside lighting to improve the performance. You can adjust the brightness on the camera if extra lighting is not available, but daytime viewing may look washed out unless you adjust it each day.Lastly - For me, the value was in the DVR. I didn't want to spend a ton of money upfront. My thought was I could always add better cameras if needed. The included 60' cables are basic quality. I suspect if I upgrade to coaxial, the picture quality will improve. I have it hooked up to an old computer monitor, but you can also connect it to a newer TV. By doing so, you may improve the picture clarity even more. In order to use this system remotely, you'll need to connect the DVR to your router via a c5 cable or wireless bridge. I plan on doing the latter as I am trying to avoid running c5 cable through my home. For areas where you might not be able to run wires, you can add a wireless camera to the system such as the Lorex LW2110 Lorex LW2110 Wireless Digital Security Camera, but you'll still need to supply the camera with power.If you are looking for an affordable starter security system and don't mind running some wires, the Zmodo PKD-DK0863 works well for me._______________________________________________________________________________________________________________Update 12/05/2012As mentioned previously, I wanted to set this up for remote viewing. In order to do this, I needed to connect the DVR to my router. You can connect via a Cat5 cable. If your router is not near your DVR, and running wires through you home is not easy/possible, you can do like I did and add a wireless bridge. I recently installed a Cisco/Linksys WET610N bridge. Set up was fairly easy. I can now view my cameras from any computer on my home network. In addition, Zmodo has an app that allows me to view the feed from my Iphone. It works very well and I'm pleased with the picture quality. If you search Zmodo remote viewing on Youtube, you'll find several videos that will help make the installation easy.

Reviews.Title: Zmodo CCTV SYstem
Reviews.Author: Anson King
Reviews.Content: I am a professional installer of CCTV surveillance system and I recently purchased this for a customer who wanted a very low budget system. As the saying goes you get what you pay for. I ended up using the DVR and replaced the cameras from another supplier.PROS: The DVR is usable, customer service is excellent ( to make up for the quality of the product), very easy to network system. PRICECONS: Camera resolution very low and dose not produce true colors (I will upload some pics to demonstrate), if the camera is facing any type of shrubbery  they appear as a light purple haze and not green. The IR distance is less that 25ft.This system would be suitable for a commercial area as a store or quick shoppe about 30' x 30'. With the cameras installed no higher that 8ft. Would not recommend it for outdoor surveillance.

Reviews.Title: Works as it should!
Reviews.Author: mackinen
Reviews.Content: This security camera system works pretty well, view angle is amazing in every light condition, the installation was easy, I installed them in my restaurant we move all the cables throw the ceiling without issues. If you are looking for some system that delivers efficiency, easy install and a fair price I think you're on the right way for sure. Some things you must consider is to buy extra long cables if you need to cover big areas like me.Speaking about the software...pretty easy to use, we only experiment some delays on remote access config because our Internet provider is a mess (not ZMODO fault's).I think if you buy it, you'll not be disappointed.Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: CatLady
Reviews.Content: I ordered this to get proof a neighbor was "peeking" at me from around the fence I put up.  For the price I am very happy.  Would I have upgraded the cameras had I any clue what I was doing?  Maybe. Would I have gone wireless so I dont have to belly crawl my attic?  Maybe.  I have more time than money so this system was exactly what I needed yet could afford.  I dont have a clue and this system was SOOOO easy and when I messed up the settings I just reset to factory settings and started over.  Simple. I'll admit, I didnt even read the installation or directions it was so easy.I have an alarm system and I can wire this into it if I choose.  I can add 4 more cameras if I choose.  I just upgraded to a smart phone and I will be setting up the system to view on that.  Isnt technology great?  Whats even better is someone like me can install, set up, monitor this system with practically NO technical skills.Thank you Zmodo and Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: EASY Install, Nice Picture!
Reviews.Author: D.A.B.
Reviews.Content: Thought I needed help installing, but it only took me a total of 90 minutes to connect cables and mount hardware.  The web access was fairly easy to configure as long as you go to [...] to do it. STILL working on getting it on my phone via the Zviewer Android App.  Trying this page:  [...]I mounted the cameras INSIDE on my windows because I wanted easy access to them in case of technical difficulty or in case I needed to reposition.  I also didn't want to run the risk of water damage or even vandalism -- which is the reason I got them in the first place -- someone stole our riding lawnmower. I uploaded a picture of what my screen looks like with the web access -- BEHIND a double-pane glass window.  So imagine the clarity if I had them mounted OUTSIDE.The picture is clear enough in the daytime -- if you're trying to do spy work, its not for you.  Good for basic home surveillance.  You can make out faces about 10 feet away.  But if the point is to just have an idea of what's going on around your property, this serves the purpose.ANYWAY, will update in a few weeks, but so far so good!UPDATE 4/24/13:  So mounting INSIDE wasn't as bright an idea once night fell -- the glass reflected so I could see NOTHING.  But STILL love the product!UPDATE 4/29/13:  Mounted them outside (basically on the opposite side of the windows where they were mounted inside) and the view is unobstructed.  You will definitely have to go into settings and adjust the color settings on each camera to get the highest night vision quality.  With all outdoor lights out, night vision is nowhere near as clear as daytime, but its tolerable.  Just make sure you have your outdoor lights on in the areas you want to watch the most.UPDATE 5/31/13:  Had a street lamp installed by the local power company.  CRYSTAL CLEAR night vision.  So the moral of the story, exterior illumination DRASTICALLY increases night visibility.  Daytime is still great.  It rained HEAVY for a couple of days straight on three different occasions since initial purchase and no problems.  So far so good.UPDATE 8/23/13:  Still going strong!  Even was able to go back to a specific time-frame and take a screen shot to catch an annoying neighbor's dog laying a major load in my mailbox flowerbed! MORE heavy rain and STILL good to go.  Great system.  Would be MUCH better if I could access it on my Android phone, but hey.UPDATE 8/24/2013:  GETTING REMOTE ACCESS ON ANDROID PHONE | Okay, I figured it out: I made sure my user name was capitalized the SAME EXACT WAY as it is on the DVR settings, in addition to removing the Http: from in front of the IP address and BINGO! It logged me in. However it works only on my Galaxy Note II and not my husband's Galaxy S2. My settings:DeviceName: (EXACTLY as you have it in your ROUTER's Port Forwarding / Port Triggering settings)Address: 192.168.1._ (No "HTTP" EXACTLY as in your router's Port Forwarding/Port Triggering settings)Port: 7050Username: (type EXACTLY as you see it in the DVR setting -- case sensitive)Password: (Your Password)[ASIN:B0058E0WO2 Zmodo PKD-DK0863-500GB Outdoor Security Camera]]

Reviews.Title: Excellent System for the price
Reviews.Author: M. Fox
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of mixed and negative reviews for this item and similar models and was skeptical, but decided to take a risk anyway.  I'm glad I did, for under $200 it is a great buy.  It is not professional grade, nor did I expect it to be.  The image quality is actually better than I expected it would be, even in total darkness it renders an acceptable image and the motion detection is almost too sensitive that I had to cut it back.  Many of the complaints surround installation and setup.  The included printed instructions are a bit lacking, but a search of FAQs on the manufacture’s website will yield better information and step by step walk thru.  The setup itself is pretty simple but if you want access over the internet it is a bit more involved.  Like anything techie, you need a basic understanding of computers and networking, You need to open a DNS account, open router ports, and configure the NVR, all of which is easier than it sounds if you just follow the directions.  I had a few issues and frustrations but found them to be more the fault of the ISPs, Time Warner & AT&T; in my case, who block ports and generally don’t seem to like to play nice with each other at the expense of their customers.  If you are accessing from within your owns network rather than across the web with multiple ISPs this should not be an issue.  Again most of the complaints deal with the setup, not the product itself, and we should not blame product for the problems caused by the 3rd party providers.  There are workarounds, and once resolved it was a fairly quick and easy process.  If you lack the tech knowledge, just get a 9 year old to do it.  PROS: good image, can view directly, via the internet but I can’t access from my work, I think it is port blocking again (but this time by corporate security) but fine form every other computer, iPad, iPhone and there is also an android app for those who have not upgraded yet.  Image is fair to good, even in total darkness.  CONS: needs to be hardwired to the router with a cat5 cable which may limit where you can place the unit, although a wireless adapter might work.  I used wired cameras, however wireless models are available.  The wireless camera isn’t 100% wireless, it connects wirelessly to the router, but it still needs AC power so it must be close to an outlet, they don’t exactly mention that.  The software is a bit rudimentary, but it works.  I can see they are improving the GUI.  BOTTOM LINE: For a low cost video surveillance system this is the ticket and in my opinion a fine product that has been unjustly treated by reviewers.

Reviews.Title: Good.
Reviews.Author: matb321
Reviews.Content: The DVR is good.The cameras are decent during the daytime and OK at night time.For the price it is a good entry level system.My biggest problem is the lack of instructions.I am very tech savvy and it took me 5-6 hours just to get the Android app and IE setup right(because there are no instructions). I am very happy with my system and enjoy watching my house from anywhere.Update...My house got broken into during the daytime 2 weeks after I installed the cameras.Police identified and arrested him because of the footage.The police and prosecutor loved the video. (None my stuff was recovered).I am going to post the video on Youtube when the case is over and post a link here.

Reviews.Title: Would be 5 stars if the system was as described
Reviews.Author: Wes
Reviews.Content: The only  difference between what is described and what I received from Amazon is the cameras.The description shows these white cameras; 30' IR (night vision); 480 Lines; CMOS sensor.What came had the silver cameras; 65' IR; 420 lines; CCD sensor.  I prefer the cameras that actually came with it over the ones it was supposed to have, even though the resolution is slightly less.

Reviews.Title: Security system
Reviews.Author: Dominick
Reviews.Content: One of the cords stopped working. I am not able to use one of tge caneras in the security system

Reviews.Title: real cheap in every way
Reviews.Author: wareagle
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these as I had a large area to cover and two would have done it. However the night I received them I hooked them up to test before installation good thing I did because one system just would not work Disk error. I returned it for refund with amazon no problem. I ordered received tested returned and was credited back within one week. As for the other system, it functioned until I got it installed and now the motion sensing for some reason is not working. I have to call support yet so for now it is on 24/7 record and overwrite. The cameras seam to be doing very well for now if you can hold off until you can save up more money you should and get a better set up. If not this is fine just check if it works before you install it.

Reviews.Title: Why the good  reviews?
Reviews.Author: PAUL B
Reviews.Content: I bought this system about 7 months ago.  The one good thing about this system is that it is still working.  But the picture  remains blurry.  I have one camera mounted on the second floor of my house to get a wide angle view of my property.  You can see people, but their faces are completely unidentifiable. That includes people that are very close to the house.  What's the purpose of this system if you can't identify the person.  The night vision on that camera, due to its distance from the second floor, is useless.  I can barely make out the shrubbery on my property.The cables are fragile junk. One of the power cables broke at the camera end while I was installing it.  I found the location of the break with an ohm meter and attempted to repair it.  I couldn't do it.  I could not strip the insulation off of the cable because of the very fine gauge of the 3 wires in that power cable.  I have a good wire stripper, but the wires in this cable are so fragile that they would break while I was attempting to remove the insulation off of the wire.  I never saw that before.Has anyone tried a different camera on this system?  It could also be that the recorder has poor resolution.  I'm using a good computer monitor.I should have returned it.  What was I thinking??

Reviews.Title: Not as advertised
Reviews.Author: Daniel C Stimeling
Reviews.Content: This unit DID NOT come with a hard drive...at all.  It's a pain to set up, and it doesn't always work  -- not a product I'd use to constantly keep my home and property safe.

Reviews.Title: Displays video, but otherwise a disappointment.
Reviews.Author: bpa
Reviews.Content: This system works well at displaying and recording video, but every other aspect of it leading up to that falls short.  Directions are significantly lacking in key information, such as the default password and username for online access, how to interface your dvr with any computer other than through online access (which you can't get into because you don't have the password), or what about half of the settings actually mean in the many detailed menus.  After spending the better part of two afternoons figuring out how to get it to function, I thought I had things running smoothly and was pleased with the live video on my iPhone.  That was until the unit started beeping constantly at 3am.  Every "alarm" is off per instructions on the zmodo website, but the beeping continues unless I turn off the dvr, which means the cameras don't work.  I will be calling zmodo's help line on the next work day to try and get this figured out, but am disappointed with what was supposed to be a user-friendly product.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the money
Reviews.Author: Rjcullop
Reviews.Content: It's everything  ad said it was easy set up .except for network  to my IPhone  view  not product fault  over my head Great item for the money.

Reviews.Title: Greta Unit and features for the price
Reviews.Author: Hott Dogg
Reviews.Content: I install and maintain security cameras and DVR for my clients and like this unit.  I also setup 8, 16, 32 channel systems.  The technical service support is great with port fowarding setup (as long as you have time to be put on hold).  The simplicity of use is great and the features are are very useful.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Choice-Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Randell S. Boysen
Reviews.Content: I had my doubts at first, but work in the Loss Prevention field...friends from work installed it and it works better than expected.  Picture clarity is outstanding and camera reviews are extremely helpful to see what goes on when I'm not there.  Totally satisfied and could not believe how it was priced so reasonably...Love it!

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Shannon Agosto "slagosto"
Reviews.Content: I just received my system yesterday and I already have it hooked up.  The installation was very easy.  Zmodo has a step by step guide on their website [...].  The only issue I had was getting the remote viewing working, because I could not open port 80 on my netgear router.  After a little research, I found that I had to do a firmware upgrade which I downloaded from Netgear's website.  Once I ran the firmware upgrade, port 80 opened up and I was able to view my cameras remotely from my Kindle.  I bought this system mainly because my teenager was having friends over while we were not home despite our clear rule of "no one in the house while we are not there".  I can't wait until the first time I give him a little surprise. :)  All in all, this camera's picture is superb for the price.  A little attic crawling, hole drilling, and following online instructions and you are set. (I am a female too)  It really is that easy.  Zmodo does sell a wireless package just like this one and for just about $100 more, things can be easier than this.  Although, I don't mind saving the $100 for a little extra work.  Oh, and the cables that attach to the cameras and run to the dvr are 60 ft long which was one of my concerns since the length was not listed in the description, but they were plenty long enough for the job that I needed to do.  Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: minimal standards for the non technical person.
Reviews.Author: L. Loza
Reviews.Content: basic dvr unit is OK but the camera picture quality is quite minimal.  Educate yourself on  camera options from multiple sources before committing to Zmodo packages. Their customer service is pretty minimal also. Polite but apparently they focus on people who do not want to be technical.

Reviews.Title: great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Peter Guerrero
Reviews.Content: I don't have any complaints about this product. for the price it does it's job. I bought an additional microphone for one of the cameras to capture audio.the only thing i wished they did was update their firmware.

Reviews.Title: Missing Parts
Reviews.Author: Herman E. Zinn
Reviews.Content: I received this item and set it up to make sure everything worked before I ran the wires. There was 1 camera missing but I set it up anyway because I ordered two more better cameras anyway. I hooked two cameras up set everything up and it worked good. The cameras were clear and bright. I went into the record mode but couldn't get it to record. I noticed the HDD light wasn't on. I took the cover off to look inside, there was only one screw holding the top cover on. The other screws were in a bag. There was no hard drive installed!!! Well that made my day, I got on my PC and went to Amazons web site to set up a return. I have the system ready to ship back and Amazon has another system on the way. Amazon makes returns very easy. I know it is not any fault of Amazons, quality control must not be very good at least not on this one. I am VERY HAPPY with Amazon. They have a new one on the way and should be here in three days. I just hope it is a complete system this time.

Reviews.Title: This is a terrible unit!
Reviews.Author: Rian Lindley
Reviews.Content: We did not receive the original unit we ordered as the company stated it was out of stock. We agreed to take a different DVR. This was a huge mistake! The DVR  we recveived was clearly used and refurbished. The manual we received was a quick setup and not very in depth. It is very difficult to use the DVR and the remote is non-responsive even with fresh batteries. The cameras are not useful at night for a distance greater than ten feet. Overall a complete waste of money! Please consider other options before purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Priced right
Reviews.Author: H. J. Bah "hamjat"
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up. But it appear that I may have to replace the cameras with better resolution. The DVR + the 500GB HD pays my initial cost so I give it 4 stars for cost and ease of use.Update:When I was unpacking the DVR I noticed some dust on the unit. For some reason the other day it just occured to me that if I wipe the front of the camera's lens I might get a better picture...and lord I did. I used an alchohol wipe and clean the front of the lens and I get some result. I figure out this unit is made in China so it's possible for some "smog" to settle on the lens glass.

Reviews.Title: i found it not the same which i bought it
Reviews.Author: Salamah A. S. Hawiti
Reviews.Content: I bought the package included , DVR , 4 outdoor camera  with 6mm lens but when I  the received the package  i found it not the same .i found it  with 3.6 lens .

Reviews.Title: It is okay
Reviews.Author: Edwinator
Reviews.Content: Instructions can be better.  I even went to the website and had to go to other online sources to figure out programming features.But is works okay.  I'm able to see what is going on around the house from anywhere.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Kevin H. Lyman
Reviews.Content: It's a decent cheap camera system.  video quality is ok or less.  The interface is clunky and not super intuitive.  The biggest problem I had was two cameras went out on me.  It turned out to be the wires running to the cameras had poor connections and I had to buy more wires.

Reviews.Title: Spend the money on better quality and support
Reviews.Author: robert raines
Reviews.Content: Cameras are pretty low quality (which I expected for price) but the real issue is in lack of support for networking and difficulty of actually getting these things online.  I had planned on upgrading the cameras at some point in the future but now am considering scrapping the whole system due to difficulties in setup.

Reviews.Title: it good ok
Reviews.Author: rags
Reviews.Content: the night vision sucks if you can make it better even if it is more money for better camera ok

Reviews.Title: CRAP!!!!!  DO NOT PURCHASE!  Warning Will Robinson!!
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Crap mounting hardware for cameras, really cheap, and does not hold the cameras well, plastic thumbscrews break very easily.. Unit picture shows on  amazon picture shows a RCA  jack to hook to the tv, but in reality a BNC jack. ( This is specified in the directions that came with unit.)  I ordered one from ebay. One of the mounting devices broke while trying to install camera. Cameras are "Bullet style cameras" and are only about 5 inches long by 3 inches wide. When the necessay adapter arrives I will update as to the actual functioning of unit. Now I am scared.Buyer beware on this very deceptive advertizing, not as represented on Amazon.Bought bnc adapter to find out it does not work. Worst resoloution cameras I have ever seen. This is crap and it's going back. What a pain in the a** to take down all the cameras.BUYER BEWARE

Reviews.Title: I would spend a little more money and get better quality one's
Reviews.Author: Judy K. Davenport "jkd"
Reviews.Content: These camera's do not work very well. The pictures are blurry. They have tons of blind spot where you cant see anything at all.

Reviews.Title: Nice, but takes awhile to setup
Reviews.Author: Garett Sansom
Reviews.Content: I gave it 4 stars because it is inexpensive. The cameras are okay, at night they cannot see very far (like maybe 30-40 feet) and detail drops a lot compared to the daytime. In order to view the cameras through the internet takes a fair amount of time and it is not user friendly and requires tampering with your router. Overall, for the price, it is an alright system.

Reviews.Title: Decent system at a good price
Reviews.Author: HoneyBeesBliss "Melissa"
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting to see a license plate at 500 feet. But I was expecting to be able to recognize someone's face at 10 feet. It is a standard, low definition surveillance system. I found a dent in my sliding glass door indicating that someone tried to pry it open. I bought this system so I could see if they come back. I also purchased a home alarm system (not from Amazon) with a motion detector mounted outside near the sliding glass door. Both of these measures are basically to deter and not prevent a home invasion. The cameras look intimidating. The infrared LEDs glow in the night. I can see people and cars when they walk or drive by. I am going to purchase a high definition camera and try it out with this system to see if it looks any better, but the DVR itself say that it is only 420 TV Lines so the resolution isn't great in the first place. The two photos they use in their item description look more like something you would see on a higher resolution system. And the photo in black and white looks like it was converted from the color photo because you can see the overhead lights are on.

Reviews.Title: DOES NOT COME WITH CAMERAS STATED
Reviews.Author: mopar
Reviews.Content: It says 6mm cameras but what you really get is 3.6mm cameras. The 6mm cameras is why i picked this one but after delivery i found 3.6mm cameras so i looked up the model number and this model number shows up on zmodo's site as it comes with 3.6mm cameras. SO that means amazon has miss information on this product and I'm not happy about it. I have only had a few hours with the system at the time of this review because I felt it was a good idea to hurry up and inform the next buyer so they wont be unhappy like me! I will try to update this review after some more use of the actual product but so far i have 1 camera hooked up and every thing is working so far. I just had to plug everything in and turned it on and it worked. The only problem so far was the power splitter for the cameras is kinda finicky. move it just a bit and your cameras loose power. Update after more use!

Reviews.Title: Cost Effective Surveillance System
Reviews.Author: C. "main"
Reviews.Content: I've installed this system three weeks ago and it has been working as advertised. Set-up was easy and everything that is required for installation came in the box. Video quality is not the greatest but I can make out color and shapes up-to 100 feet away. The DVR software is easy to use although written instructions that came with the system does not go in-depth. Video recording and play back is also very easy.I rate this product 4.0 because of the instructions that is provided and the camera mounting stands. The camera stands are of very low quality and does not allow many mounting positions. As mentioned earlier before, the instructions that came with the system is lacking. To network the system, you will need to seek additional information online if your not a techie.Overall, for the price the system is OK. I recommend it for a small home/office.Note: If you want this system for a small home/office, you do not need to by extra cables. I bought the extra 100ft cable and did not need to use it.

Reviews.Title: video system
Reviews.Author: tom
Reviews.Content: Not bad for the price tho one of the cameras I received is not functioning properly easy to set up and easy to use

Reviews.Title: Great quality for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jessica Ward
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical after reading other reviews but decided to give it a try. We are very pleased with it all!  The quality is great and the cameras give a good quality picture.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: vanessa risner
Reviews.Content: I decided to send my system back. The quality of the picture wasn't great. Although it was clear enough to see images, you couldn't make out faces well!! At night it was awful, and it wouldn't record anything for me at all. I needed it because I moved and was having a problem with thieves, and it did not record for me, so I had no use for it. It'd be great if say, if it would record like it says it does..

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied!
Reviews.Author: NELSON SANTOS
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife's dental office outside the US. It has a learning curve but once you figure it out, it's pretty easy. If you're the sort that likes tinkering, and figuring things out, this unit is perfect! If not, you should get someone to install it for you. For the price, this system can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: Great deal and great product
Reviews.Author: rebecca martin
Reviews.Content: Takes a learning curve but overall a great camera system that can do more than you expect. Definitely recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Good For The Price
Reviews.Author: Justin S. Barshaw
Reviews.Content: Great product I installed it all in four hours works great. Only bad thing is the brackets are made cheaply.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the bucks.
Reviews.Author: Mike "DaRevrund"
Reviews.Content: This is a BASIC system. I knew that going in so I am a pretty happy customer. That being said, let's look at a few things.The instruction manual is somewhat dicey. English was evidently NOT the first language of the author. Once you figure out the syntax, it isn't too bad but be prepared.Networking the system was a challenge but it works and works well. (I figured it all out without calling the support line so it can't be that tough.)Remote viewing works well too.The email alerts are handy. It even sends a snapshot. Since I get them on my Blackberry, I haven't tried the remote viewer for the phone. I'll toy with that later if the mood strikes.Night vision is serviceable but of very short range.Overall this is still nice for a system that costs less than some cameras do alone. (One can always add upgrade cameras later.) I'd rate it as a good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: zmodo pkd
Reviews.Author: mike

Reviews.Content: This is an excellent outdoor security camera.  The camera's produces a excellent color picture.  Installation and set-up was very easy by following the instructions.  Yes I would recommend this security camera as a great purchase to anyone.

Reviews.Title: zmodo 500 gb outdoor security system
Reviews.Author: Kevin "€x°¶}u$"
Reviews.Content: I purchased a zmodo a few years back and paid 350 for the complete system, it is still working great. I wanted a new system to add more cameras so I went with this brand because my other one works great after years of use.This unit only ran me 178 for the complete system which made me think why such a dramatic price drop. I purchased this system about 3-4 months ago, It seems they have updated the system to be more friendly user.The copy speed was split in half. It only takes less than a minute to grab and copy footage to a scan disk. They also made it easier to view footage faster. I totally love the new updated system.

Reviews.Title: Camera System
Reviews.Author: Robert Taylor
Reviews.Content: Seems to work pretty good.  There is a little bit of a learning curve to understand how to get to the full 1 hour files.  Otherwise you are looking at only half an hour if you do not select the correct things.  Good picture, even at night.

Reviews.Title: Best money I ever spend.
Reviews.Author: Helen Williams "hwilli79997"
Reviews.Content: This is great it was easy to put in and two other people that live on my street are going to order the Zmodo outdoor security cameras.

Reviews.Title: security at it's best
Reviews.Author: Hope Smith
Reviews.Content: Best thing we ever purchased. although they have no lights for night vision the quality is more than I expected for the value.

Reviews.Title: Good system, false advertising
Reviews.Author: J. P. McKay "Paul McKay"
Reviews.Content: On the whole this is a good system at a good price and I am satisfied with it.  However, before you order one you should know two things.1)  Despite what it says in the listing, this system DOES NOT come with a hard drive. You will have to buy one yourself and install it. I know it says it comes with a 500 GB HDD, it does not. The manual is very clear that it does not.2) The manual is terrible and the system is not listed in the online guides at Zmodo. At some point you will be asked for a password. Going online will make you think it might be 888888. It is not. It is 111111. You will need to know this.Other than that it seems to be working as well as expected for the price.

Reviews.Title: Exellent product and quality
Reviews.Author: Maria Jose Garcia
Reviews.Content: I bought this item becuase I am really need it.I will buy another as soon as I return trip to USA

Reviews.Title: Hardware was easy enough to setup, but remote viewing is a no go for me.
Reviews.Author: Elpablo
Reviews.Content: Setting up the cameras and dvr were fairly easy. Setting up the software for remote viewing however is impossible. The instruction manual was no help, looked online and was again no help. I tried for about 2 weeks, and gave up.  I have setup my Dlinks with dynamic dns accounts and setup them up to take pics and email them to me with movement and I still cannot figure out how to setup Zmode. Same  thing for my father-in-law who has the same setup at his house and he also cannot figure Zmode out and he has experience with networks etc.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Flowerchild63
Reviews.Content: Happily surprise with this camera.  Wide, clear views, not very difficult to hook up.  Highly recommend this product.  Good value.

Reviews.Title: Pay a little more for a better brand
Reviews.Author: Chump Stain
Reviews.Content: Took a chance on this set hoping that the price didn't match the quality.  After messing around with the sluggish interface and the frequent lockups I decided to send it back.  I think if you're wanting some type of security camera solution you will want something you can rely on.  I say move on and spend a little more for a higher quality set.

Reviews.Title: it works
Reviews.Author: Jose M Torres Mora
Reviews.Content: I was not sure that this product was going to work as advertised but after I received and figured out the minor connections and software details, this product is great.

Reviews.Title: Not sure
Reviews.Author: Sean "S.M"
Reviews.Content: I had to return this product because it's hard-wiring and it was pretty expensive to have it installed outside my house.  The product came in brand new condition.
